main event: A sighting of one bright elliptical object was reported from a ship, observed at a distance of 2000 yards elevation moving in a southerly direction.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes,The object was seen 45 seconds after launch of a DINK,The object had a constant light on and showed no appendages,Two timed intervals for object visibility were recorded at 5 seconds and 20 seconds,The sighting occurred in the Pacific region.
